Room.Name: Drow Elves Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a room of velvet darkness. But you are not alone.
Room.LongDescription: Along the wall are several beds and small footlockers, while over in the corner is a small shrine which you recognize as being dedicated to the drow goddess Loth. You ponder the meaning of drow elves in a goblin shrine. Ah. Now you remember the rumors of an alliance between dark elves and the goblins. It looks like there is more truth to that rumor than people want to believe. You need to get this information to the authorities in Ocean- crest. That is, if you can get out of here alive.
